# Preprocessing

## Create table

1.  Define which columns are relevant. The relevant columns will be used to create a concise table for subsequent analysis.

```{r}
eye_table <- joint.data %>% select(uniform_id, subid, lang, itemid, ianum, ia, skip, nfix, refix, dur, firstrun.dur, firstrun.gopast, firstrun.gopast.sel)
```
